p: The AChE structure contains different binding sites [ 52]. The catalytic residues Ser203, Glu337, and His447 are located in the same cavity of the enzyme, which also contains other important residues for enzymatic activity, for example, Gly121, Gly122, and Ala204 (oxyanion hole), Trp86, Tyr133, Tyr337, and Phe338 (anionic subsite), and Phe295 and Phe297 (acyl pocket) [ 53].
